library(gridExtra)
library(ggpubr)
shortnum <- data$SB_BOUT_SHORT_NUMBER

longnum<- data$SB_BOUT_LONG_NUMBER

mycolors2 <- rainbow(max(middleduration))

longnumvec <- findInterval(longnum, vec=seq(-1,300, 75), left.open=T)
